name: World's Hardest 3D Game
description:
Welcome to the World's Hardest 3D Game!

This game is inspired by World's Hardest Game which is 2D so I decided to create a 3D version (levels aren't copied from the original game, all levels are original) that builds upon the old game we all used to love playing at school way back then in 2013.

This game is perfect for people who want to revisit a fun game they used to play but in 3D and also good for speed runners to try out.

This game is still in development as every day I work little by little with the time I have to develop it, so there may be bugs and the game is far from finished. Despite that, I hope you'll still have a fun time and if you want to aid in the development of this game consider donating as little as $1 so it can be worked on more and made better.

If you have any ideas you'd like to share for me to implement into the game don't be shy to comment them on this page. Thank you for reading and have a great day!

Version 1.0.1
